General.Name: Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes aluminum products and parts in Thailand. The company offers automotive parts, which includes engine, head lamp heatsinks, fan clutch, air compressor, audio heatsink, and other parts; motorcycle parts comprise engine parts, cosmetic, and frame arm parts; and electric products consisting of CCTV, air conditioner, and washing machine parts. It provides home decoration products for modern, antique, sculpture, buddhist and portrait styles; and agricultural machinery. Sanko Diecasting (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.
General.Address: Rojana Industrial Park Rayong, Rayong, Thailand, 21120
